Overview.text:
7 French catheter inserted through
sheath introducer
into the right side of the heart to measure CVP and pulmonary artery pressures
Uses the principle of
balloon flotation
Small balloon inflated at tip of catheter
Allows tip to travel through right atrium to right ventricle to pulmonary artery
Has two ports; one rests in right atrium and second rests in pulmonary artery
Normal pressures:
RA: 2-6 mmHg
RV: 20-30/0-5 mmHg
PA: 20-30/5-15 mmHg
PCWP: 4-12 mmHg
